item.description:
With bittersweetness, we bid adieu to Stephanie and Stuart - two founding members of this group - and wish them all the best as they set their beer-ogling sights on Washington D.C.

Please join them one final time at one of their favorite watering holes.

RSVP limit is 15, so please be kind -- reserve a seat only you're 100% sure you can make it.

Se you there... I'll bring the hugs and tissues.

- Alicia

P.S. Bon voyage beer is thoughtful of you, though it's not necessary.
item.name: D.C. Send Off for Stephanie & Stuart
